[Page Title: Katsubō | Japanese Restaurant in North Charleston, SC]

Homepage
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 3 Slide 2 of 3 Slide 3 of 3 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Menu

Rooted in Craving. Centered in Comfort.

At Katsubō, we don’t just serve food—we serve full-on flavor experiences. Our ramen starts with slow-simmered broths and craveable toppings that turn everyday ingredients into something next-level.

And when it comes to drinks? We keep it just as bold. Our bar features Japanese-inspired cocktails, Japanese beers, sake, and wine selections that hit just right alongside crispy double-fried chicken.

Everything we make is done with care, creativity, and the Katsubō hustle—great food, great vibes, no shortcuts.
Menus 
Visit Us
North Charleston, SC 29405 4628 Spruill Ave, 
Monday - Saturday from 11:00 am - 9:00 pmClosed Sunday

Please contact us for reservations for parties of 6 to 10
hello@katsuboeats.com Order Now

[Page Title: Visit Us | Katsubō Chicken & Ramen in North Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Hours & Location
4628 Spruill Ave, North Charleston, SC 29405 
Closed Sunday
Monday - Saturday from 11:00 am - 9:00 pm 
Katsubō is a mostly walk-in experience. All are welcome, any time, no reservations needed. However, if you'd like to make a reservation for a party of 6-10, you can email us at
hello@katsuboeats.com 
Parking

There is free parking across the street along South Ave, and there are 2 free parking lots on the corner of Jenkins and Spruill Ave.
Get Directions Order Now
